description: Rachel is a Very Important Customer (VIC) at Chanel in Singapore. She is known for her impeccable taste in luxury fashion and frequently shops for exclusive pieces. Rachel appreciates Chanel's heritage and craftsmanship, and she often attends brand events and private showings. Her loyalty and engagement with the brand make her a valued member of Chanel's elite clientele in the region.

seasonal_offerings.name: Coco Mademoiselle Spring Set
seasonal_offerings.purchase_information: Purchased annually for the past three years.
